name: Slash 'n Dash (spcreat)
description:
Slash 'n Dash is a fast-paced arcade game with a simple art style. Use the mouse to dash forward, slash blocks, and reach insane speeds! Endlessly climb a procedurally generated series of platforms, blocks and explosives to get the highest score possible! Just make sure you don't fall...

Created for the 10th ScoreSpace game jam with the theme direction.

Created By

spcreat - Programming and design

Xalias - Music
